contributorsYaml.name: Andrea A.
contributorsYaml.role: Andrea has developed an innovative methodology ("AMiCI") based on concept inventories to efficiently and accurately measure the occurrence of misconceptions. He also contributed to expanding the list of misconceptions.
contributorsYaml.bio: Andrea was a PhD student at the Università della Svizzera italiana and then a PostDoc Researcher at the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETHZ) and at the Università della Svizzera Italiana.
